headline.main: Personal Health Nutritional Standards For the 80's; Personal Health Public concern with nutrition will focus attention on R.D.A. R.D.A.: Defining Needs of the Healthy

docs.abstract: Jane E Brody article on latest National Academy of Sciences update of its Recommended Dietary Allowances, 9th since it began making list of human nutritional requirements in early 40's; table (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: IN the early 1940's, when wartime food shortages threatened the nation's high nutritional standards and the Government had to provide millions of meals for the armed forces, the Na tional Academy of Sciences devised a list of human ...
